name: Kevin Miller
about: Technology executive with over 25 years of experience leading engineering organizations, scaling distributed teams, and delivering enterprise-grade solutions across financial, nonprofit, and consumer sectors. Proven ability to accelerate delivery timelines, reduce operational costs, and align technical innovation with strategic business outcomes. Founder of multiple software ventures and recognized with Microsoft’s MVP Award for technical leadership. As a trained chocolatier and former sous-chef in culinary competitions, I bring creativity, discipline, and attention to detail to every domain I lead. Public speaker and content contributor with an audience reach of over 18 million through conferences, technical publications, and community engagement.

highlights.text: Scaled nine engineering teams delivering solutions to 17 of the top 20 financial institutions managing DAFs
Cut operational expenses by $500,000+ annually through technical innovation and vendor optimization
Recognized with Microsoft MVP Award for technical excellence and community leadership
Reduced time-to-market from 6 weeks to 2 days through organizational and process redesign
Partnered closely with product and business stakeholders to align engineering priorities with customer impact and growth strategy

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Launched Echelon Foundry consulting practice
executiveAccomplishments.details: providing strategic technology and business advisory services to nonprofits, fintech companies, and investors.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Created and maintain HelixNote,
executiveAccomplishments.details: a proprietary AI-powered documentation and analytics platform supporting diagnostic investigations, regulatory reporting, and modernization projects.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Developed the Echelon Diagnostic Framework,
executiveAccomplishments.details: combining AI-assisted analysis, forensic investigation, and standards-based verification to identify and resolve complex system failures.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Applied the framework across digital, financial, and physical domains
executiveAccomplishments.details: including a 2024-2025 materials forensics study (ACI 302.1R-80 / ASTM) evaluating concrete integrity and pigment dispersion, and an independent analysis of fintech business models assessing structural risk and capital efficiency.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Delivered measurable improvements in diagnostic accuracy and audit traceability
executiveAccomplishments.details: through AI-driven automation, structured data capture, and evidence-based reporting.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Incorporated accessibility principles into AI-driven documentation workflows
executiveAccomplishments.details: to ensure usability for low-vision and assistive-technology users, integrating inclusive design as part of HelixNote’s analytical interface.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Advised executives and boards
executiveAccomplishments.details: across technology, finance, and infrastructure sectors on modernization, compliance, and AI adoption strategy.

executiveAccomplishments.highlight: Mentored engineering and leadership teams
executiveAccomplishments.details: in diagnostic thinking, cultural transformation, and evidence-based modernization practices.
